Quickstart¶

A minimal example showcasing the pyxkcd API.

Sync example¶

import xkcd
client = xkcd.Client()

# Get the latest comic
comic = client.latest()

# Get the comic number:
print(comic.num)

Async example¶

import asyncio
import xkcd

async def main():
    client = xkcd.AsyncClient()
    comic = await client.latest()
    print(comic.num)

asyncio.run(main())

There are also more examples in the repository.
